section.title: SVN Access for MyFaces
section.p: MyFaces uses the Subversion (SVN) source code repository. The SVN server is maintained by the Apache Software Foundation. Click here for more information on the ASF source code repositories.
Use the following command to get the latest source code:
The source code can also be viewed online here using viewcvs.
